verses.roman:
sabe dekhi--haya mora kṛṣṇa vidyamāna
vidyut-prāya dekhā diyā haya antardhāna'

synonyms: sabe—only this; dekhi—I know; haya—there is; mora—My; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; vidyamāna—brightly present; vidyut-prāya—like lightning; dekhā diyā—appearing; haya—there is; antardhāna—disappearance.
translation: "I can only remember that I saw My Kṛṣṇa, but only for an instant. He appeared before Me, and then, like lightning, immediately disappeared."
